register.title: Museum of Power
register.description:
This is no ordinary show. It is a public display of what might potentially happen when you have a bold, true, occasionally reckless - yet always pure - love for the game.Welcome to the exhibition of Power.
In this role me and Alfred Kang were worked our asses to delivery in time. It was about one week, we developed bold and serious algorithms fast. Went a pleasure to worked on.
Thanks Puma, thanks Syrup

register.title: African Cup of Nations
register.description:
Ola fellow football aficionado - welcome to Angola - heart of african football during the cup, the four tournament cities are like a big buffet of joy and football to enjoy, consume and explore - This is for you.
This role was my first work to New York and definitely was a proof what I am capable to do in short time, it does took my xmas, new year eve and some more days. Whatever, the final results was awesome

register.title: Smirnoff Black
register.description:
Smirnoff is a vodka brand created by Piotr Arsenieyevich Smirnov. Currently owned by conglomerate Diageo. Smirnoff, has the name of "Смирновская Водка", translated it means Smirnovskaya vodka.
I developed this project long time ago and until nowadays it represent much than past for me. It took me to another level of programation, flash and commitment in work.
